author: Tony A. SÃ¦le [tony@globalit.no]
param:
{integer} match
  The match to show status for.
description:
A small widget showing home and away team for a single match.
  The widget will not load the match, and relies on the resource to have been
  loaded already.
 
  Shows home team, away team, score (if match has started) or start time.
name: MatchStatus
